```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(pdxTrees)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```


```{r}
park_trees <- get_pdxTrees_parks()

trees <- count(park_trees, Common_Name) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  top_n(10) 
mytrees <- trees$Common_Name

common_trees <- park_trees %>%
  filter(Common_Name %in% mytrees)

count(common_trees, Common_Name)
```


```{r}
ggplot(common_trees, aes(x=Common_Name, y=Tree_Height))+
  coord_flip()+
  #geom_point(aes(size=DBH), color="#B2DCAC", alpha=.3)+
  geom_quasirandom(groupOnX = TRUE, aes(color=DBH), alpha=.3, size=1)+
  theme_classic()


ggplot(common_trees, aes(x=Longitude, y=Latitude, z=density))+
  geom_contour()
```
